name: Cup anime
description: The mesh model is executed in 3ds Max 2015. There are three .max files in the archive with Corona and Mental Ray and V-Ray renderers. To open the scene does not require a special plugin. Polycounts: Objects 7 no Smooth: 7,571 faces and 7423 vertices Objects 7 MeshSmooth level 1: 29,972 faces and 29,980 vertices Objects 7 MeshSmooth level 2: 119,888 faces and 119,896 vertices All textures and materials are included and assigned 6 textures have a resolution of 2048x2048 px 1 texture Light HDRI, resolution 4000x2000 px Show more
short_description:
